snippet: The invitations to many of Donald J. Trump's fund-raisers may conspicuously lack host lists, but that's not the case for the invitations to Mr. Bush's events, like this one for a fund-raiser for Senator John McCain. Some of the Republican Party's biggest donors are helping the former president raise money for embattled senators. The Times redacted some contact information.
lead_paragraph: The invitations to many of Donald J. Trump's fund-raisers may conspicuously lack host lists, but that's not the case for the invitations to Mr. Bush's events, like this one for a fund-raiser for Senator John McCain. Some of the Republican Party's biggest donors are helping the former president raise money for embattled senators. The Times redacted some contact information.

headline.main: Invitation to John McCain Fund-Raiser Headlined by George W. Bush
